price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu huhakikisha Haki kwa maneno yake, hata wanga chukia wakosefu
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
footnotes: Ama Haki hapana shaka Mwenyezi Mungu atainusuru na ataiunga mkono kwa uwezo wake na hikima yake hata makafiri wakisaidiana katika kuichukia na kuipiga vita.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
